Enjoying the stream?

Support the channel by hitting the follow button!

Fun Fact

Despite years of web development experience Topher has never developed professionally. He's looking to make a career change soon!

What do you think?

Microsoft is acquiring Github for $7.5B. Great news or RIP Github?

Enjoying the stream?

Support the channel by hitting the follow button!

Fun Fact

Topher starting making crude websites in 1998 when he was 13 years old. Amazingly, he's still making crude websites today.

Working on a project?

Feel free to share it with me. I'd love to take a look at it!

Thanks for watching!

I appreciate your support. Don't forget to follow.

Fun Fact

Topher started programming by making screen savers for Windows 95 in Visual Basic.

Did you know?

Stack Overflow named JavaScript, HTML, and CSS the top three most popular languages to learn in 2018. There has never been a better time to become a web developer!

Thanks for watching!
